text: The Red Meadows () is a 1945 Danish World War II drama movie directed by Bodil Ipsen and Lau Lauritzen Jr. and based on the novel of the same name by Ole Valdemar Juul. It stars Poul Reichhardt, Lisbeth Movin, Per Buckhøj, Gyrd Løfqvist, Kjeld Jacobsen, Karl Jørgensen and distributed by ASA Film. ==Other websites== * Category:1945 drama movies Category:1945 war movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Bodil Ipsen
title: The Red Meadows
